name: Guitrauma
description:
This is Lea. Lea was skilled at playing music since she was born. Because of her skill, she always sings and plays guitar in front of her class, until this day. In this day, she made a minor mistake with big consequences which gave her a trauma. Her classmates laughed at her because of that mistake. After her friends behave, she felt humiliated and ran to the restroom to cry.

After many years, Lea grew up and went to the high school. In these years Lea didn’t stop playing guitar and she gained more skills. She had a dream since she was a kid. And making this dream come true wasn’t hard for her. When the big day came, she went to the scene and started what she makes best. After her magnificent performance, audience loved her performance and started to clap her on foot. Lea was so happy that she completed her child dream and beat her trauma. Beating her trauma helped her become a rising star.
